explanation: [0-0] A round basin filled with water is placed on a flat surface. A piece of foil floats on the water, with a white ball on top of it, and a stick inserted into the ball.

[0-5] Then a hand holding the stick immerses the white ball into the water, wrapping the foil around the ball. The scene then switches to a transparent glass bowl filled with water, placed on a white surface, with a stick inserted into a red candy, soaking in the water. The scene changes to show the red candy covered in yellow foil, with the transparent glass bowl next to it. Subsequently, the scene switches to show white subtitles on a black background: "Nobody will guess the final color", along with a surprised emoji. A black disc is placed on a stone, and liquid from a green container on the right is poured into the disc. Then the scene switches to a stirring rod mixing the green liquid in the disc until it thickens. Afterward, a right hand picks up the green jelly-like substance.
